Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: Six English lines interspersed among nine Latin lines: 5 then 4 rhyming Latin lines, then 1 English, then 5 Latin lines

CamJes13.First Lines:
Marie moder wel þe beAl oure triste is on
                    þe…
CamJes13.Last Lines:
…Ay leuedi to þe we kalleA swete mayde here oure
                    steuene
